com.mygdx.game.view.entities

Class AppView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.mygdx.game.view.entities.AppView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameView, LostView, MenuView, PausedView, WonView

    public abstract class AppView
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
    An abstract class to represent the multiple views of the game
